TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Babau, title = Babau, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Babau} }

S.FORM: alang Babau ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 58 buwan, 222 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 213 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 9 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 91%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Babau hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Babau hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Babau hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Babau hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Babau hya' ga Qmocyan. tay mkyahu' na Babau hya' ga Qnau. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 3 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Babao ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 58 bowan, 222 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 213 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 9 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 91%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ro kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Babao hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Babao hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Babao hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Babao hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Babao hya' ga Qmocyan. tay mkyaho' na Babao hya' ga Qnao. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 3 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
